long_description: If you're a full-time bike commuter or about to set out on a long touring adventure, the Sunlite Bike Cargo Trailer is just what you need to haul everything from groceries to camping gear. Powder-coated tubular steel frame and heavy-duty nylon base offer high durability. 20 in. wheels quickly detach when placing trailer in a car. Axle-mount arm; 120 lb. cargo capacity. Overstock.
